titleStmt.title: The adventures of (Mr. T.S.) an English merchant taken prisoner by the Turks of Argiers, and carried into the inland countries of Africa : with a description of the kingdom of Argiers ... / written first by the author, and fitted for the public view by A. Roberts ; whereunto is annex'd an observation of the tide, and how to turn a ship out of the straights mouth, the wind being westerly, by Richard Norris.
titleStmt.author: T. S.
Roberts, A., 17th cent.
Norris, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
